value.title: Make your tables look AMAZINGLY beautiful with these two tricks in Power BI

value.title: Running totals by subcategory in Power Query!!
value.excerpt: I showed you on last monday's video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uX3_dnb5on0 how to do running totals in power query, and in this video I will show you how to do it but by subcategory or group. value.title: Debug DAX using Variables in Power BI
